Container.Name: Hive Mining Monitor
Container.Overview: Monitor HiveOS mining rigs and publish real-time statistics to MQTT broker. Tracks hashrates, temperatures, uptime, and worker status with configurable intervals. Perfect for home automation integration with Home Assistant, Node-RED, or other MQTT-enabled systems.
Container.Description:
HiveOS Mining Monitor for Unraid - Monitor your mining rigs and publish data to MQTT.
Features: • Real-time monitoring of HiveOS mining workers • MQTT publishing for home automation integration • Configurable monitoring intervals (default: 5 minutes) • Temperature and hashrate tracking • Worker uptime and status monitoring • Secure API authentication • Lightweight PowerShell-based container
Requirements: • HiveOS API token (get from HiveOS account settings) • HiveOS Farm ID (found in dashboard URL) • MQTT broker (local or remote)
MQTT Topics Published: • mining/farm/{farm_id}/workers/count - Total workers • mining/farm/{farm_id}/workers/online - Online workers • mining/farm/{farm_id}/workers/{worker_id}/hashrate - Individual hashrates • mining/farm/{farm_id}/workers/{worker_id}/cpu_temperature - CPU temps • mining/farm/{farm_id}/summary/total_hashrate - Farm total hashrate • mining/farm/{farm_id}/summary/efficiency - Farm efficiency %

Config.Name: HiveOS API Token
Config.Description: Your HiveOS API authentication token (get from HiveOS Account Settings → API)

Config.Name: HiveOS Farm ID
Config.Description: Your HiveOS Farm ID (found in farm dashboard URL after /farms/)

Config.Name: MQTT Broker
Config.Description: MQTT broker hostname or IP address (e.g., 192.168.1.100)

Config.Name: MQTT Username
Config.Description: MQTT broker username (leave empty if no authentication required)

Config.Name: MQTT Password
Config.Description: MQTT broker password (leave empty if no authentication required)

Config.Name: Update Interval
Config.Description: Seconds between mining data updates (300 = 5 minutes, 60 = 1 minute)

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (99 = nobody user)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (100 = users group)
